articles.author: Vikki Blake
articles.title: Helldivers 2 is giving away bonus XP this weekend to "alleviate the impact" of an on-going bug - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: Helldivers 2 is awarding all players a 50 per cent XP and requisition bonus to compensate players for "a problem" that'…
articles.content: Helldivers 2 is awarding all players a 50 per cent XP and requisition bonus to compensate players for "a problem" that's preventing players from receiving the correct rewards at the end of missions.… [+2081 chars]
